<template>
  <select name="" id="" v-model="currentPlayer">
    <option v-for="player in players" :key="player.id">
      {{ player.name }}
    </option>
  </select>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  props: {
    players: {
      type: Array,
      default() {
        return [];
      },
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      currentPlayer: "",
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
